name: Aesthetic Personal website Template
description:
Hello everyone! here is my new portfolio Landing Page.

Feel free to give me some feedback. do comment and show some love.


I’ve decided to make it open source. My hope is that people new to design can use it as a jumping-off point for their own site. Please remix, learn from it, and use it as you please (just don’t sell it!).


Feel free to rebuild it in webflow / Squarespace or even better, rebuild it by hand in html/js/css.



Want to collaborate? Email Us: samarjitmahi6245@gmail.com

kindly give credit ->
